stimulusHtml: A particle-level diagram of a metallic element is shown above. Typically, metals are both malleable and ductile. The best explanation for these properties is that the electrons involved in bonding among metal atoms are
choicesHtml: unequally shared and form nondirectional bonds
unequally shared and form highly directional bonds
equally shared and form nondirectional bonds
equally shared and form highly directional bonds
